argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isdrng | |- ( R e. DivRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ ( Unit ` R ) = ( ( Base ` R ) \ { ( 0g ` R ) } ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbi | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Ring ) |
